content: dorothea blanket by dada s place dorothea blanket dorothea blanket is a beautiful textured granny square blanket very easy to make it can be made with any yarn in any size you can easily adjust the size of the squares simply by adding more rounds to the square you can also adjust the size of the blanket by adding more squares to the blanket this pattern is suitable for advanced or adventurous beginner who wants to explore new stitches and learn how to achieve a beautiful texture with only basic crochet stitches page 1 of 12 dorothea blanket by dada s place stitch guide for pattern support please contact dadasplace@gmail com chain stitch chain yarn over pull yarn through loop on hook if you want to receive notifications about slip_stitch slip st insert hook into stitch yarn over and draw new patterns blog posts or special offers yarn through stitch and through loop on your hook please sign up for my newsletter single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into stitch yarn over pull up a loop yarn over and pull yarn through both loops on hook skill level double_crochet double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch pull up intermediate a loop three loops on hook yarn over pull yarn through two crochet terminology loops yo pull yarn through two remaining loops on hook the pattern is written in english using us 5tr bobble stitch bobble yarn over twice insert hook into crochet terms stitch pull up a loop yarn over pull yarn through two loops crochet hook 3 mm twice yarn over twice insert hook into same stitch pull up a loop yarn over pull yarn through two loops twice 4 times finished measurements yarn over and draw yarn through all 6 loops on hook 95cm x 95 cm 37 4 x 37 4 front post treble_crochet fptr yarn over twice insert hook yarn from front to back to front around post of indicated stitch pull up a loop yarn over pull yarn through two loops on hook alize angora gold three times 100 g/550 m 3 58 oz/601 yds 80% acrylic 20% wool color ivory no 599 you ll need 4 skeins of 100 g 95 x 95 cm 37 4 x 37 4 gauge isn t crucial for this project 22 sts and 12 row in double_crochet to measure 10 x 10 cm border 4 x 4 before blocking with 3 mm crochet hook and recommended yarn abbreviations us terms 95 x 95 cm 37 4 x 37 4 chain st chain stitch st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch yo yarn over beg - beginning single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round round repeat - repeat fptr front post treble_crochet rs right side ws wrong side page 2 of 12 dorothea blanket by dada s place pattern instructions notes the square is worked in the round join each round with slip_stitch to beg chain-3 space chain-3 at beg of each round counts as double_crochet the square round 1 chain-3 in magic_ring 1 double_crochet in
